resource.name: Screening
resource.title: Library - HIV Screening
resource.publisher: National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC)
resource.description: Logic library for implementation of the CDC HIV Screening Recommendation.
resource.purpose: The purpose of this is to implement a Clinical Decision Support Workflow via CDS-Hooks to establish the CDC's HIV Screening Recommendation.
resource.usage: This is to be used in conjunction with a patient-facing FHIR application.
resource.copyright: Â© Copyright National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC) 2021+.

coding.code: Whether the patient has been sexually active with men
coding.display: Whether the patient has been sexually active with men

resource.name: Screening
resource.title: CDC HIV Screening
resource.publisher: National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC)
resource.description: This PlanDefinition defines a a Clinical Decision Support CDC Recommendation for HIV Screening
resource.purpose: The purpose of this is to identify and build CDS support for HIV Screening.
resource.usage: This is to be used in conjunction with a patient-facing FHIR application.
resource.copyright: Â© Copyright National Association of Community Health Centers, Inc. (NACHC) 2021+.

action.title: Recommendation
action.description: Determines type of recommendation regarding status of HIV Screening.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in screening population.
Determines what recommendation patient should be provided.

action.title: Exclusion from HIV Screening
action.description: Determines if patient was excluded from HIV Screening Recommendation.

expression.description: Determine if Patient is in hiv exclusion population.
Rationale for why patient was excluded from the hiv screening.
